languages.text: Судя по костюму, этот человек принадлежал к высокому сословию. Кто-то аккуратно, с большим мастерством, срезал с его лица кожу.
Judging by his attire, the man was of high social standing. Someone has carefully and skilfully peeled the skin off his face.
languages.original_text: Судя по костюму, этот человек принадлежал к высокому сословию. Кто-то аккуратно, с большим мастерством, срезал с его лица кожу.

traits.locale_text: Judging by his attire, the man was of high social standing. Someone carefully and skilfully peeled the skin off his face.

Judging by his attire, the man was of high social standing. Someone has carefully and skilfully peeled the skin off his face.

languages.text: その服装から判断すると、男は高い社会的地位にあったようだ。誰かが彼の顔の皮を、注意深く、そして巧妙に剥いでいた。
languages.original_text: Judging by his attire, the man was of high social standing. Someone has carefully and skilfully peeled the skin off his face.

traits.locale_text: その服装から判断すると、男は高い社会的地位にあったようだ。誰かが彼の顔の皮を、注意深く、そして巧妙に剥いでいた。

languages.text: Kıyafetlerinden anlaşıldığı kadarıyla adam, yüksek bir statüye sahipmiş. Yüzünü büyük bir itina ve ustalıkla soymuşlar.
languages.original_text: Judging by his attire, the man was of high social standing. Someone has carefully and skilfully peeled the skin off his face.

traits.locale_text: Kıyafetlerinden anlaşıldığı kadarıyla, adam yüksek bir statüye sahipmiş. Birisi yüzünü büyük bir itina ve ustalıkla soymuş.

languages.text: A juzgar por su indumentaria, esta persona gozaba de elevado estatus social. Alguien ha pelado cuidadosamente la piel de su cara.
languages.original_text: Judging by his attire, the man was of high social standing. Someone has carefully and skilfully peeled the skin off his face.

traits.locale_text: A juzgar por su indumentaria, esta persona gozaba de elevado estatus social. Alguien ha pelado cuidadosamente la piel de su cara.

languages.text: 从这具尸体的衣着判断，他生前社会地位很高。不知是谁以巧妙的手法，小心翼翼地剥掉了他的脸。
languages.original_text: Judging by his attire, the man was of high social standing. Someone has carefully and skilfully peeled the skin off his face.

traits.locale_text: 从这具尸体的衣着判断，他生前社会地位很高。不知是谁以巧妙的手法，小心翼翼地剥掉了他的脸。

languages.text: À en juger par ses atours, la victime était un homme de haut rang. Quelqu'un a décollé la peau de son visage avec le plus grand soin.
languages.original_text: Judging by his attire, the man was of high social standing. Someone has carefully and skilfully peeled the skin off his face.

traits.locale_text: À en juger par ses atours, la victime était un homme de haut rang. Quelqu'un a décollé la peau de son visage avec le plus grand soin.

languages.text: Seinen Gewändern nach hatte der Mann einen hohen gesellschaftlichen Rang. Jemand hat akribisch und geschickt die Haut von seinem Gesicht geschält.
languages.original_text: Judging by his attire, the man was of high social standing. Someone has carefully and skilfully peeled the skin off his face.

traits.locale_text: Seinen Gewändern nach hatte der Mann einen hohen gesellschaftlichen Rang. Jemand hat akribisch und geschickt die Haut von seinem Gesicht geschält.
